initial_firm_notification: Telephone
distribution_pattern: Product was distributed in Washington.
product_description: Licorice ice cream is packed in 2.5 gallon bulk, 1.5 gallon bulk, or half gallon retail size tubs.  Retail size ice cream flavor is labeled in part, "***Husky Ice Cream, Inc. 4721 California Ave SW Seattle, WA 98116  HUSKY "Cream of the Town" HALF GALLON ICE CREAM www.huskydeli.com INGREDIENTS: CREAM, MILK, SKIM MILK POWDER, SUGAR, CORN SYRUP SOLIDS, CAROB BEAN GUM, GUAR GUM, SOY LECITHIN, CARRAGEENAN".     No UPC code.
reason_for_recall: Licorice Husky ice cream is being recalled due to the potential to be contaminated with Listeria monocytogenes. This product contains an ice cream mix ingredient manufactured and recalled by Snoqualmie Gourmet Ice Cream, Inc.
code_info: Production date is hand-written on 2.5 gallon bulk containers.
